rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious hallway welcoming guests with a nod to Art Deco aesthetics, featuring geometric patterns and bold colors.

rooms.name: Living Room / Studio Space
rooms.description: An open-plan living area that doubles as a studio space with flexible partitions for art display and work. Incorporates Art Deco elements such as ornate moldings and decorative lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen with modern appliances integrated into an Art Deco style design, featuring streamlined cabinetry and polished finishes.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchenette, offering a dining space that maintains flow with the living area while incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy circulation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modest bathroom designed with efficient fixtures and decorative tiles that complement the overall Art Deco theme, positioned to adhere to Vastu guidelines regarding water placement.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.details: Double doors with an Art Deco inspired archway and a vestibule leading into the entrance hallway. Ensures proper alignment as per Vastu norms for entry.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.details: Strategically placed windows ensuring ample natural light and cross ventilation. Windows designed with geometric Art Deco patterns.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom / Studio Loft
rooms.description: A split-level studio space that can be used as a master bedroom or creative loft. Features high ceilings, Art Deco decorative elements, and Vastu-aligned positioning for relaxation.

rooms.name: Workspace / Guest Room
rooms.description: Convertible space serving as an additional guest room or home office, integrating storage solutions while maintaining design consistency with the overall Art Deco style.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.details: A private balcony offering views of the garden and ensuring ventilation. Designed to adhere to local building norms for open spaces.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.details: An elegantly designed staircase that is both functional and decorative, incorporating Art Deco motifs and safety features as per local building codes.

garden.description: A large, landscaped garden with a blend of indigenous plants and geometrically arranged walkways to complement the Art Deco design. Features water elements and seating areas.

garage.description: A two-car garage integrated into the overall design, ensuring easy access from the main entrance while adhering to local building regulations.
